title: Jeb:Minecraft PE即将在0.9.0加入皮肤系统
author: a20001017
txt_content:
更多详见：Jeb:将迁移皮肤数据



Jeb:On that topic, we're aiming to introduce skins on MCPE in the 0.9.0 update



Jeb:接着那个话题，现在我们正致力于在MCPE0.9.0中引进皮肤系统。
